  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE1038</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Where Do You Get Information?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Woher Erhalten Sie Informationen?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">D'où Obtenez-vous l'Information ?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">De onde Você Começa A Informação?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Dove Ottenete Le Informazioni?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πού παίρνετε τις πληροφορίες;</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">¿De dónde Usted Consigue La Información?</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">learners will conduct a survey and find out what different forms of media people use to find information.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">internet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">radio</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">t.v</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">lesson plan</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">information age</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Anfänger leiten eine Übersicht und finden heraus, welche
unterschiedliche Formulare der Medialeute verwenden, Informationen zu 
finden.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">les étudiants conduiront une étude et découvriront 
quelles différentes formes des personnes de medias utilisent pour 
trouver l'information.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">os learners conduzirão um exame e encontrarão para fora 
que formulários diferentes de povos dos media se usam encontrar a 
informação.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">i principianti eseguiranno un'indagine e scopriranno che 
forme differenti della gente di media usano trovare le informazioni.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">οι αρχάριοι θα πραγματοποιήσουν μια έρευνα και θα 
ανακαλύψουν ποιες διαφορετικές μορφές των ανθρώπων μέσων 
χρησιμοποιούν για να βρούν τις πληροφορίες.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">los principiantes conducirán una encuesta y descubrirán 
qué diversas formas de gente de los media utilizan encontrar la 
información.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Internet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Radio</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">t.v</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lektionplan</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Informationen Alter</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Internet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">radio</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">t.v</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">plan de leçon</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">âge de l'information</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Internet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">rádio</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">t.v</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">planta da lição</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">idade da informação</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Internet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">radio</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">t.v</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">programma di lezione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">età delle informazioni</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διαδίκτυο</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ραδιόφωνο</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">t.v</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">σχέδιο μαθήματος</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ηλικία πληροφοριών</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Internet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">radio</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">t.v</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">plan de la lección</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">edad de la información</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
